name: Ginkgo Biloba 500 mg
description: Supports brain circulation and cognitive function: memory, concentration, coordination. Reduces tinnitus and dizziness, helps with fatigue.

facts.name: Ingredients per serving
facts.value: Ginkgo biloba leaf extract — 500 mg; Ginseng root extract — 20 mg; Citicoline — 15 mg

name: Magnesium B6
description: Magnesium participates in numerous metabolic processes, helps with irritability, muscle cramps, and sleep disorders. Vitamin B6 supports the nervous system and improves magnesium absorption.

facts.name: Ingredients per 1 ml
facts.value: Magnesium taurate (Mg) — 450 mg; Magnesium malate (Mg) — 250 mg; Vitamin B6 — 5 mg

name: Burdock Extract 500 mg
description: Promotes overall health, aids healing, helps with inflammation, normalizes weight and blood pressure, detoxifies, and reduces swelling.

name: Spirulina 1000 mg
description: Supports immunity and gut microbiota, rich in protein and dietary fiber, helps regulate blood sugar and metabolism.

name: Omega-3 1000 mg
description: Essential fatty acids for brain and cardiovascular function, immunity, skin, and vision. Helps normalize lipid metabolism.

facts.name: Ingredients
facts.value: Fish oil — 1000 mg; EPA — 180 mg; DHA — 120 mg

name: Vitamin B Complex
description: B-complex vitamins for energy metabolism, CNS function, and blood formation. Supports hemoglobin synthesis, red blood cell production, and carbohydrate metabolism.

facts.name: Ingredients per serving
facts.value: B1 — 50 mg; B2 — 50 mg; B3 — 50 mg; B5 — 20 mg; B6 — 10 mg; Biotin — 100 mcg; Inositol — 50 mg; Folic acid — 400 mcg; B12 — 50 mcg; Choline — 20 mg

name: Iron Kids
description: Supports immunity, tissue growth, and repair. Iron deficiency can lead to anemia.

name: Propolis Multivitamin & Multimineral
description: Natural immune modulator with propolis and a blend of vitamins and minerals. Supports inflammation, healing, and digestive health.

facts.name: Ingredients (per 10 ml)
facts.value: Propolis 100 mg; Vit A 1000 IU; B1 0.7 mg; B2 0.8 mg; B3 8 mg; B5 5 mg; B6 1 mg; B12 2 mcg; C 60 mg; D 400 IU; E 10 mg; K 30 mcg; Copper 340 mcg; Selenium 20 mcg; Iodine 50 mcg; Zinc 3 mg; Folic acid 100 mcg; Biotin 15 mcg

name: Women's Multivitamin
description: Balanced complex for women's health: digestion, immunity, metabolism, skin, and energy support.

facts.name: Ingredients (partial 1)
facts.value: Vit C 50 mg; Mg 50 mg; Cranberry extract 50 mg; CoQ10 20 mg; Vit B3 10 mg; Vit B5 100 mcg; Vit E 50 mg; Fe 400 mcg; Zn 7.5 mg; Vit B6 3.3 mg; Choline 2.5 mg; Inositol 2.5 mg; Copper 2000 mcg; Manganese 2 mg; Vit B2 1.87 mg

facts.name: Ingredients (partial 2)
facts.value: Vit B1 1.65 mg; Lutein 1 mg; Lycopene 600 mcg; Folic acid 400 mcg; Vit A 300 mcg (1000 IU); Biotin 300 mcg; Chromium 200 mcg; Zeaxanthin 200 mcg; Iodine 150 mcg; Selenium 100 mcg; Vit K 80 mcg; Molybdenum 75 mcg; Vit B12 25 mcg; Vit D 25 mcg (1000 IU); Vanadium 10 mcg

name: Vitamin D3 10,000 IU
description: Supports immunity and healthy calcium metabolism, promotes vascular elasticity, and prevents tissue calcification.

name: Anti-Stress
description: Supports anxiety and tension relief, normalizes sleep. Contains St. John's wort, passionflower, and valerian extracts.

facts.name: Ingredients
facts.value: St. John's wort extract 300 mg; passionflower extract 100 mg; valerian extract 100 mg

name: Ca-Mg-Fe-D3
description: Balanced combination of calcium, magnesium, iron, and vitamin D for bones, blood, and metabolism.

facts.name: Ingredients
facts.value: Ca 500 mg; Mg 250 mg; Fe 16 mg; Vit D 15 mcg (600 IU)

name: Artichoke & Dandelion Extracts
description: Supports liver and bile function, antioxidant protection, mild diuretic effect.

facts.name: Ingredients
facts.value: Artichoke extract 400 mg; dandelion root extract 200 mg

name: St. John's Wort + Parsley
description: Herbal support: antibacterial, sedative, and regenerative properties; helps with stress and seasonal colds.

facts.name: Ingredients
facts.value: St. John's wort extract 600 mg; parsley extract 200 mg

name: Collagen — 30 Sachets
description: Three collagen types + vitamin C, hyaluronic acid, CoQ10, zinc, biotin, and B vitamins for skin, joints, and overall tone.

facts.name: Ingredients (key)
facts.value: Collagen I/III — 9950 mg; Vit C — 300 mg; HA — 100 mg; Collagen II — 50 mg; Vit E — 7 mg; Zn — 5 mg; Q10 — 5 mg; Vit B5 — 3.5 mg; Biotin — 2.5 mg; B6 — 1.4 mg; B12 — 2.5 mcg

name: Zinc (Complex)
description: Supports immunity, skin, and metabolic processes. Enhanced with vitamin C, D, and selenium.

name: Probiotic
description: Multi-strain probiotic: protects against pathogens, synthesizes vitamins, improves mineral absorption, and supports immunity.

facts.name: Strains (per daily dose)
facts.value: L. plantarum 4.6×10^9; L. acidophilus 3×10^9; L. paracasei 3×10^9; L. rhamnosus 2.2×10^8; L. brevis 2.2×10^8; S. thermophilus 2.2×10^8; B. bifidum 2×10^8; B. infantis 1.7×10^8; L. reuteri 1.3×10^8; B. longum 3.8×10^7; L. bulgaricus 1.6×10^7

name: Slimming Complex
description: Toning and weight management support: guarana, green tea, CLA, L-carnitine, garcinia, cinnamon, gymnema, 5-HTP, and chromium. Boosts endurance, focus, and metabolism.

facts.name: Ingredients (per 1 / 2 capsules)
facts.value: CLA 250 / 500 mg; L-carnitine 100 / 200 mg; Guarana extract 125 / 250 mg; Green tea extract 50 / 100 mg; 'Alfalfa/maca'* extract 50 / 100 mg; Garcinia 25 / 50 mg; Cinnamon 25 / 50 mg; Gymnema 25 / 50 mg; 5-HTP 20 / 40 mg; Chromium 66 mcg (120/240% DV)

name: Ginkgo Biloba — Syrup
description: Supports memory, mental clarity, and focus; improves brain circulation, dilates blood vessels, and normalizes blood pressure.

facts.name: Ingredients
facts.value: Ginkgo biloba leaf extract — 375 mg; Korean ginseng extract — 20 mg; Citicoline — 15 mg

name: Demir Dikeni (Tribulus) Complex
description: Supports male reproductive function, endurance, and vascular health. Contains tribulus, epimedium, ginseng, L-arginine, and L-carnitine.

facts.name: Ingredients (per serving)
facts.value: Tribulus extract (saponins 900 mg) — 100 mg*; L-arginine 200 mg; Epimedium extract 200 mg; Korean ginseng extract 75 mg; Galangal powder 75 mg; L-carnitine 100 mg

facts.name: Note
facts.value: *Source lists both 'saponins 900 mg' and '100 mg' — reconciled per catalog text.

name: Vitamin C 1000 mg (Effervescent)
description: Supports immunity, blood vessels, and skin health, improves iron absorption and collagen synthesis.
